title: Add Canberra, Chebyshev, Earth Movers and Manhattan Distance Stream Evaluators
description: Streaming Expressions already supports Euclidean distance. This ticket will add Canberra, Chebyshev, Earth Movers and Manhattan Distance Stream Evaluators
